tickets.title: Issue with login
tickets.description: User is unable to log in to their account. Receiving an "Invalid Credentials" error despite using the correct password.

tickets.title: Cannot access files
tickets.description: User reports being unable to access files in the shared drive. Permission denied error is displayed.

tickets.title: Password reset request
tickets.description: User requested a password reset. The reset link was sent and the user has confirmed they have successfully reset their password.

tickets.title: Email configuration issue
tickets.description: User is having trouble configuring their email client. SMTP settings are not being accepted.

tickets.title: Software installation problem
tickets.description: User is unable to install the required software. Installation process fails at 75% completion.
